annoy.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to make someone feel slightly angry and unhappy about something
annoy.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: What annoyed him most was that he had received no apology.
She annoyed him with her stupid questions.
It really annoys me when I see people dropping litter.
annoy.translation[0].definitions[0].note: In everyday English, people also often use the phrase get on someone's nerves:
She got on his nerves with her stupid questions.
